properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued January 5 at 8:27PM EST until January 6 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Lakeshore flooding increased by westerly gales along the
shoreline overnight and Monday morning.

* WHERE...Huron and Tuscola Counties.

* WHEN...Until noon Monday.

* IMPACTS...The wind direction is more along the shore than
directly onshore but is strong enough to produce elevated water
level and high waves capable of increasing the flood hazard in
prone areas along the shoreline.
properties.instruction:
Residents on or near the shore should take appropriate action to
protect property from high waves and rising water level.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MONDAY
